trans-unit.source: Represents a selectable item inside a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Menu" />.

<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>, which means its header and collection of objects can be of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 이 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>, 즉 헤더와 개체의 컬렉션 (예: 문자열, 이미지 또는 패널) 형식일 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl> class.
A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> can have submenus.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 하위 메뉴를 포함할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The submenu of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> is made up of the objects within the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: 하위 메뉴는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 내에서 개체 이루어집니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>합니다.

trans-unit.source: It is common for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> to contain other <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> objects to create nested submenus.
trans-unit.target: 일반적으로 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 다른 포함 하도록 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 을 중첩 된 하위 메뉴를 만들 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> can have one of several functions:
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 함수 중 하나를 가질 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: It can be selected to invoke a command.
trans-unit.target: 명령을 호출 하는 선택할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: It can be a separator for other menu items.
trans-unit.target: 다른 메뉴 항목에 대 한 구분 기호 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: It can be a header for a submenu.
trans-unit.target: 하위 메뉴에 대 한 머리글 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: It can be checked or unchecked.

By default, the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> is set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
The default horizontal position of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> is <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Center?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

If you set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> through a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>, the stack panel's default is applied and the item is centered.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 통해는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>, 스택 패널의 기본값이 적용 되 고 항목 가운데에 배치 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown> event, so if you attach an event handler to <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>, your handler will never be called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 핸들의 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown> 를 이벤트 처리기를 연결 하는 이벤트, 따라서 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>, 처리기에 호출 되지 것입니다.

trans-unit.source: To add your own handler, subscribe to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseDown> event or subscribe to <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown> by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 고유의 처리기를 추가 하려면 구독 하는 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseDown> 이벤트 구독 또는 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown> 호출 하 여 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> 와 `handledEventsToo` 로 설정 `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: Customizing the MenuItem Control
To apply the same property settings to multiple <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 여러 동일한 속성 설정을 적용 하려면 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 컨트롤을 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 기본값을 수정할 수 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> 고유한 모양을 제어할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 만들기에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, 참조 [는 ControlTemplate을 만들어 기존 컨트롤의 모양 사용자 지정](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>, see [Menu Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/menu-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: 부분 및 관련 된 상태를 보려면는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>, 참조 [메뉴 스타일 및 템플릿](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/menu-styles-and-templates.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 종속성 속성을이 컨트롤은 컨트롤의 기본 스타일으로 설정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 기본 스타일 속성은 응용 프로그램에이 컨트롤이 표시 하는 경우 속성이 기본값에서 변경 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 기본 스타일 응용 프로그램이 실행 중인 때 사용 되는 데스크톱 테마에 따라 결정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: 시각적 속성을 설정만 영향을 미칠 경우 해당 속성을 둘 다에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 컨트롤의 기본 템플릿에 하 고 사용 하 여 설정 됩니다는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: "변경의 시각적 구조의 정도 제어" 섹션의 시각적 속성 목록을 찾을 수 있습니다 [는 ControlTemplate을 만들어 기존 컨트롤의 모양 사용자 지정](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> to manipulate text in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 한 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> 텍스트를 조작 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> contains <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> objects that use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Command%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsCheckable%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A> properties and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Checked>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Unchecked>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Click> events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> 포함 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 사용 하는 개체는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Command%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsCheckable%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A> 속성 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Checked>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Unchecked>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Click> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> class.
Occurs when a menu item is checked.
Routed Event Information
Identifier field
Routing strategy
Bubbling
Delegate
The following example demonstrates handling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Checked> event.
Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Checked" /> routed event.
Occurs when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is clicked.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Click> event does not occur if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> has a submenu.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Click> 경우 이벤트가 발생 하지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 에 하위 메뉴가 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
Identifier field
Routing strategy
Bubbling
Delegate
The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> to manipulate text in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 한 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> 텍스트를 조작 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> contains <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> objects that use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Command%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsCheckable%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A> properties and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Checked>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Unchecked>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Click> events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> 포함 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 사용 하는 개체는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Command%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsCheckable%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A> 속성 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Checked>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Unchecked>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Click> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Click" /> routed event.
This event corresponds to a left mouse button click.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트는 마우스 왼쪽된 단추 클릭에 해당합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the command associated with the menu item.
The command associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" />.
The default is <see langword="null" />.
This property is used to associate a command with a particular <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> instance.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 사용 하는 특정 명령과 연결 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 인스턴스.

trans-unit.source: The following example associates the **Copy** command with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> and automatically supplies the input gesture text **Ctrl+C**.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 연결 된 **복사** 명령에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 자동으로 입력된 제스처를 제공 합니다. **Ctrl + C**합니다.

trans-unit.source: The example does not set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A> property, but the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> is "Copy" at run time.
trans-unit.target: 예제에서는 설정 되지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A> 속성을 하지만 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A> 에 대 한는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 런타임 시 "복사"가 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: You can specify another header for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> if you want it to be different.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 다른 헤더를 지정할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 일치 하지 않아도 들어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For information on how to bind to the desired command, see [Add a Command to a MenuItem](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/013d68a0-5373-4a68-bd91-5de574307370).
trans-unit.target: 참조에 원하는 명령에 바인딩하는 방법에 대 한 내용은 [MenuItem에 명령을 추가](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/013d68a0-5373-4a68-bd91-5de574307370)합니다.

trans-unit.source: A command is raised when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> is clicked—just after the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 명령을 발생 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 클릭-바로 뒤의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Click> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: The command is raised on the element according to the following priorities:
trans-unit.target: 다음과 같은 우선 순위에 따라 요소에서 발생 하는 명령입니다.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.CommandTarget%2A> is set on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>, that element is used.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.CommandTarget%2A> 에 설정 되어는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>, 해당 요소가 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>.
The focus target of the main window that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>.
trans-unit.target: 포함 된 주 창 포커스 대상은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> that was clicked.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following examples show how to use the command property to associate commands with menu items.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예에서는 메뉴 항목 명령 연관 시킬 명령 속성을 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the parameter to pass to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Command" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" />.
The parameter to pass to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Command" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 에 전달할 매개 변수는 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Command" /> 속성은 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" />합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.CommandParameter" /> dependency property.
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Command" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the target element on which to raise the specified command.
The element on which to raise the specified command.
The default is <see langword="null" />.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.CommandTarget%2A> property specifies the element where the command occurs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.CommandTarget%2A> 속성은 명령이 발생 하는 요소를 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.CommandTarget%2A> is not set, the element that has keyboard focus will receive the command.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.CommandTarget%2A> 키보드 포커스가 있는 요소 명령을 받습니다를 설정 하지 않으면 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.CommandTarget" /> dependency property.
Creates or identifies the element used to display a specified item.
The element used to display a specified item.
Gets whether the control supports scrolling.
<see langword="true" /> in all cases.

If the control has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> in its style and has a custom keyboard scrolling behavior, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.HandlesScrolling%2A> should return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤에 있는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> 의 스타일에 스크롤 동작을 사용자 지정 키보드 있으며 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.HandlesScrolling%2A> 반환할지 `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the icon that appears in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" />.
The icon that appears in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" />.
The default value is <see langword="null" />.
Many <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> controls have more than just text in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> elements.
trans-unit.target: 많은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> 컨트롤에 텍스트 이외의 있는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: Often there are icons, check marks, accelerators, and arrows to indicate submenus.
trans-unit.target: 종종 아이콘, 확인 표시, 가속기 및 하위 메뉴를 가리키는 화살표 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following example creates a menu item with an icon.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 아이콘과 함께 메뉴 항목을 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Icon" /> dependency property.
Sets the text describing an input gesture that will call the command tied to the specified item.
The text that describes the input gesture, such as **Ctrl+C** for the **Copy** command.
trans-unit.target: 와 같은 입력된 제스처를 설명 하는 텍스트 **Ctrl + C** 에 대 한는 **복사** 명령입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
This property does not associate the input gesture with the menu item; it simply adds text to the menu item.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성에서 입력된 제스처 메뉴 항목과 연결 하지 않습니다. 메뉴 항목에 텍스트를 추가 하기만 하면 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The application must handle the user's input to carry out the action.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램은 사용자 입력을 처리하여 작업을 수행해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For information on how to associate a command with a menu item, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Command%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 메뉴 항목과 명령을 연결 하는 방법에 대 한 정보를 참조 하십시오. <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Command%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following examples show how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.InputGestureText%2A> property to assign keyboard shortcuts text to menu items.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제를 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.InputGestureText%2A> 속성을 메뉴 항목에 바로 가기 키 텍스트를 할당 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.InputGestureText" /> dependency property.
Gets a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> can be checked.
<see langword="true" /> if the menu item can be checked; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 메뉴 항목을 선택할 수 있는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following example shows how to make <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> controls that are checked when a user clicks them.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 만드는 방법을 보여 줍니다. <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 있는 컨트롤을 클릭 하면 해당 옵션을 선택 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsCheckable" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is checked.
<see langword="true" /> if a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is checked; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 경우는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 고, 그러지 않으면 선택한 <see langword="false" />합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.BindsTwoWayByDefault%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Journal%2A>
The following example shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsChecked%2A> property can be used to place a check mark in front of a menu item.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제와 방법을 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsChecked%2A> 속성 메뉴 항목 앞에 있는 확인란을 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsChecked" /> dependency property.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled" /> property is <see langword="true" /> for the current menu item.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> can be selected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 경우는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 수 선택한 없으면 <see langword="false" />합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is highlighted.
<see langword="true" /> if a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is highlighted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 경우는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 고, 그러지 않으면 강조 표시 된 <see langword="false" />합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
Starting with the .NET Framework version 3.0 Service Pack 1, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsHighlighted%2A> property has a protected setter.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 버전 3.0 서비스 팩 1부터는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsHighlighted%2A> 속성에는 보호 된 setter가 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To use this functionality, your application should target the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: 이 기능을 사용 하려면 응용 프로그램은.NET Framework 버전 3.5 대상으로 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [.NET Framework Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 [.NET Framework 버전 및 종속성](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)을 참조하십시오.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following example shows how to determine whether a menu item is highlighted.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 메뉴 항목은 강조 표시 여부를 확인 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsHighlighted" /> dependency property.
Specified item.
Determines if the specified item is (or is eligible to be) its own <c>ItemContainer</c>.
<see langword="true" /> if the item is its own <c>ItemContainer</c>; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Gets a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is pressed.
<see langword="true" /> if a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is pressed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 경우는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 고, 그러지 않으면 누름 <see langword="false" />합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
Starting with the .NET Framework version 3.0 Service Pack 1, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsPressed%2A> property has a protected setter.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 버전 3.0 서비스 팩 1부터는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsPressed%2A> 속성에는 보호 된 setter가 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To use this functionality, your application should target the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: 이 기능을 사용 하려면 응용 프로그램은.NET Framework 버전 3.5 대상으로 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [.NET Framework Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 [.NET Framework 버전 및 종속성](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)을 참조하십시오.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsPressed%2A> property in a menu item style.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsPressed%2A> 속성 메뉴 항목 스타일입니다.

trans-unit.source: When the menu item is pressed, the style of its foreground, text size, and text style change.
trans-unit.target: 메뉴 항목을 누를 때, 전경, 텍스트 크기와 텍스트 스타일 변경 스타일입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsPressed" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the submenu of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is open.
<see langword="true" /> if the submenu of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is open; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 하는 경우의 하위 메뉴는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 고, 그러지 않으면 열려 <see langword="false" />합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsSubmenuOpen%2A> is set to `true`, mouse capture is set to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> and its subtree.
trans-unit.target: 때 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsSubmenuOpen%2A> 로 설정 된 `true`, 마우스 캡처로 설정 되어는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 및 해당 하위 트리 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
The following example shows how to open a submenu of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>.
In this example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> called `fileMenu` contains a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> called `recentFiles` that has a submenu.
trans-unit.target: 이 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 호출 `fileMenu` 포함는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 호출 `recentFiles` 에 하위 메뉴가 있는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When `fileMenu` is opened, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SubmenuOpened> event is raised and the `FileMenu_Opened` event handler opens the submenu of `recentFiles`.
trans-unit.target: 때 `fileMenu` 열릴는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SubmenuOpened> 이벤트가 및 `FileMenu_Opened` 이벤트 처리기의 하위 메뉴를 엽니다. `recentFiles`합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsSubmenuOpen" /> dependency property.
Gets whether a menu suspends animations on its <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control.
<see langword="true" /> if the menu should suspend animations on its popup; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 메뉴 해당 팝업에 애니메이션을 일시 중단 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsSuspendingPopupAnimation" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the custom logic for choosing a template used to display each item.
A custom object that provides logic and returns an item container.
trans-unit.target: 논리를 제공 하 고 항목 컨테이너를 반환 하는 사용자 지정 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerTemplateSelector> to choose different item containers if the items in your collection are the same type and you need to provide custom logic to choose the item container.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 프로그램 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerTemplateSelector> 하 여 컬렉션의 항목은 동일한 유형 및 항목 컨테이너를 선택 하는 사용자 지정 논리를 제공 해야 할 경우 컨테이너의 다른 항목을 선택 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.ItemContainerTemplateSelector" /> dependency property.
The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed" /> event.
Responds when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey" /> for this control is invoked.
Called when the template's tree is generated.
The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Checked" /> event.
Called when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsChecked" /> property becomes <see langword="true" />.
This method raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Checked" /> routed event.
The control raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Checked> event by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.
For more information, see [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).

When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.OnChecked(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.OnChecked(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 재정의 하는 경우 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.OnChecked(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" /> 파생된 클래스에서 호출 해야 기본 클래스의 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.OnChecked(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" /> 메서드 등록 된 대리자가 이벤트를 받도록 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Called when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is clicked and raises a <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click" /> event.
If you inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>, be sure to call the base class to get the following behavior.
trans-unit.target: 상속 하는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>, 다음과 같은 동작을 가져오도록 기본 클래스를 호출 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Toggling of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsChecked%2A> property.
Focus being set to the menu item.
trans-unit.target: 메뉴 항목으로 설정 되 고 초점을 맞춥니다.

trans-unit.source: Automation invoke event.
<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Click> event.

Provides an appropriate <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer" /> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] automation infrastructure.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" />.
The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.GotFocus" /> event.
Announces that the keyboard is focused on this element.
The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized" /> event.

Called when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsInitialized" /> property is set to <see langword="true" /> and raises an <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized" /> event.
The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged" /> event.
Called when the focus is no longer on or within a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" />.
The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemsChanged" /> event.
Called when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> property changes.
The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown" /> event.
Responds to the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown" /> event.
The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter" /> event.
Called whenever the mouse enters a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" />.
The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave" /> event.
Called whenever the mouse leaves a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" />.
The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown" /> event.
Called when the left mouse button is pressed.
The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp" /> event.
Called when the left mouse button is released.
The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseMove" /> event.
Called when the mouse is moved over a menu item.
The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonDown" /> event.
Called when the right mouse button is pressed.
The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonUp" /> event.
Called when the right mouse button is released.
The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SubmenuClosed" /> event.
Called when the submenu of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is closed.
This example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.OnSubmenuClosed%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 방법을 보여 주는이 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.OnSubmenuClosed%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SubmenuOpened" /> event.
Called when the submenu of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is opened.
This example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.OnSubmenuOpened%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 방법을 보여 주는이 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.OnSubmenuOpened%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Unchecked" /> event.
Called when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsChecked" /> property becomes <see langword="false" />.
This method raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Unchecked" /> routed event.
The control raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Unchecked> event by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.
For more information, see [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).

When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.OnUnchecked(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.OnUnchecked(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 재정의 하는 경우 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.OnUnchecked(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" /> 파생된 클래스에서 호출 해야 기본 클래스의 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.OnUnchecked(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" /> 메서드 등록 된 대리자가 이벤트를 받도록 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Old value of the parent of the visual, or null if the visual did not have a parent.
Called when the parent of the visual <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> changes.
Element used to display the specified item.
Specified item.
Prepares the specified element to display the specified item.
Preparing the element may involve applying styles, setting bindings, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 요소를 준비할 때는 바인딩 설정 스타일 적용을 포함 하 고 등 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the role of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" />.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItemRole" /> values.
The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItemRole.TopLevelItem" />.
The value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Role%2A> depends on the relationship to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> and other <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: 값 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Role%2A> 에 대 한 관계에 따라 달라 집니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> 및 기타 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Role" /> dependency property.

Gets the resource key for a style applied to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Separator" />.

The resource key for a style applied to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Separator" />.
trans-unit.target: 에 적용 된 스타일에 대 한 리소스 키를 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 때는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Separator" />합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to change the style of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> in a menu.
trans-unit.target: 스타일을 변경 하려면이 속성을 사용 하 여 한 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> 메뉴에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
<*object* *property*={ **MenuItem.SeparatorStyleKey**}`"`/>
The following example shows how to use this property to style a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>.
trans-unit.target: 스타일을이 속성을 사용 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> 에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Container to which the style will be applied.
Item to which the container belongs.
Used to determine whether to apply a style to the item container.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Separator" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Gets or sets a value that indicates that the submenu in which this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is located should not close when this item is clicked.
<see langword="true" /> if the submenu in which this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is located should not close when this item is clicked; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 경우이 하위 메뉴 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 위치한이 항목이 고, 그러지 않으면 클릭 한 때를 닫지 마십시오 <see langword="false" />합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.StaysOpenOnClick%2A> property to create an item in a submenu that does not close when the item is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.StaysOpenOnClick%2A> 속성 항목을 클릭할 때 닫히지 않습니다 하위 메뉴에서 항목을 만들려고 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.StaysOpenOnClick" /> dependency property.
Occurs when the state of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsSubmenuOpen" /> property changes to <see langword="false" />.
Routed Event Information
Identifier field
Routing strategy
Bubbling
Delegate
The following examples demonstrate calling and handling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SubmenuClosed> event.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에 나와 호출 및 처리는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SubmenuClosed> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SubmenuClosed" /> routed event.
Gets the resource key for a style applied to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is a header of a submenu.
The resource key for a style applied to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is a header of a submenu.
trans-unit.target: 에 적용 된 스타일에 대 한 리소스 키를 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 때는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 하위 메뉴의 헤더입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to change the style of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> whose <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Role%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItemRole.SubmenuHeader?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 스타일을 변경 하려면이 속성을 사용 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 인 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Role%2A> 속성이 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItemRole.SubmenuHeader?displayProperty=nameWithType>합니다.

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
<*object* *property*={ **MenuItem.SubmenuHeaderTemplateKey**}`"`/>
Gets the resource key for a style applied to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is a submenu.
The resource key for a style applied to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is a submenu.
trans-unit.target: 에 적용 된 스타일에 대 한 리소스 키는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 때는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 하위 메뉴가 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to change the style of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> whose <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Role%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItemRole.SubmenuItem?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 스타일을 변경 하려면이 속성을 사용 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 인 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Role%2A> 속성이 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItemRole.SubmenuItem?displayProperty=nameWithType>합니다.

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
<*object* *property*={ **MenuItem.SubmenuItemTemplateKey**}`"`/>
Occurs when the state of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsSubmenuOpen" /> property changes to <see langword="true" />.
Routed Event Information
Identifier field
Routing strategy
Bubbling
Delegate
The following examples demonstrate calling and handling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SubmenuOpened> event.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에 나와 호출 및 처리는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SubmenuOpened> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SubmenuOpened" /> routed event.
Gets the resource key for a style applied to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is a header of a top-level menu.
The resource key for a style applied to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is a header of a top-level menu.
trans-unit.target: 에 적용 된 스타일에 대 한 리소스 키를 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 때는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 최상위 메뉴의 헤더입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to change the style of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> whose <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Role%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItemRole.TopLevelHeader?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 스타일을 변경 하려면이 속성을 사용 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 인 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Role%2A> 속성이 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItemRole.TopLevelHeader?displayProperty=nameWithType>합니다.

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
<*object* *property*={ **MenuItem.TopLevelHeaderTemplateKey**}`"`/>
Gets the resource key for a style applied to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> when it is a top-level <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> that can invoke commands.
The resource key for a style applied to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> when it is a top-level <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> that can invoke commands.
trans-unit.target: 에 적용 된 스타일에 대 한 리소스 키를 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 최상위 때 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 명령을 호출할 수 있는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to change the style of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> whose <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Role%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItemRole.TopLevelItem?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 스타일을 변경 하려면이 속성을 사용 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 인 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Role%2A> 속성이 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItemRole.TopLevelItem?displayProperty=nameWithType>합니다.

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
<*object* *property*={ **MenuItem.TopLevelItemTemplateKey**}`"`/>
Occurs when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is unchecked.
Routed Event Information
Identifier field
Routing strategy
Bubbling
Delegate
The following example demonstrates handling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Unchecked> event.
Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Unchecked" /> routed event.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the menu selects different item containers, depending on the type of the item in the underlying collection or some other heuristic.
<see langword="true" /> the menu selects different item containers; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 메뉴 선택 컨테이너의 다른 항목입니다. 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />합니다.

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <see langword="false" />.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 값에 영향을 줄 수 요소에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [종속성 속성 값 우선 순위](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is useful if you want to create a menu by binding to a collection.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 컬렉션에 바인딩하여 메뉴를 만들려는 경우에 유용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The item container is the UI element that displays the object in a collection.
trans-unit.target: 항목 컨테이너에는 컬렉션에 개체를 표시 하는 UI 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: If you want to bind to a collection to create a menu that contains <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> objects and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> objects, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MenuBase.UsesItemContainerTemplate%2A> property to true and create an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerTemplate> for each type of object in your collection.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에 포함 된 메뉴를 만들려면 바인딩될 하려는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 개체 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> 개체를 설정는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MenuBase.UsesItemContainerTemplate%2A> 속성을 true로 만들는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerTemplate> 각 유형의 컬렉션에 개체에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerTemplate> must contain either a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> or a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator>.
trans-unit.target: 각 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerTemplate> 하나 포함 해야 합니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.UsesItemContainerTemplate" /> dependency property.
